entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Ensure NuGet.Localization is updated as part of the NuGet code flow #39559
  • Retrieving assembly version or other related info without reflection #39555
  • Dotnet Local tool installs should be versioned out of `Directory.Packages.props` if available #39554
  • MSBuild: Custom Target after Publish runs before AoT binary is in publish directory #39549

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2405732 #39546
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Use workload sets as per user request #37681
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #39547
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add MSI Installation Tests #38782
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • NET tool roll forward error experience #38210
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Move dotnet/format to dotnet/sdk #38857
    untriaged
  • dotnet watch refactoring #39410
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #39531
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
